power.title: Awaken the Slumbering Hurt
power.fluff: Your foes' wounds allow you to dodge at just the right angles to foil their attacks and when you attack, you focus on a single enemy's injuries and find the perfect place to strike

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes extra damage from your next attack equal to your Strength modifier. The attack must be made before the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed. During this movement, bloodied enemies cannot trigger actions based on your movement.

power.title: Balance Restored
power.fluff: Dropping into a wide stance helps you deliver the greatest impact, while also ensuring that you can deal with any counterattacks that follow

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target up to a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the target up to a number of squares equal to one-half your Strength modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift 1 square.
Until the start of your next turn, when an enemy adjacent to you attacks you, you can knock that enemy prone after the attack is resolved.

power.title: Call up the Savage Wind
power.fluff: A stiff gust rises up to scatter your enemies and speed you over treacherous terrain

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can slide each target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed, ignoring difficult terrain.

power.title: Drunken Monkey
power.fluff: You lurch seemingly out of control, bewildering them as they try to hit your swaying form until your cunning jab causes one of your foes to attack its companion

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target makes a melee basic attack as a free reaction against one enemy of your choice. It gains a bonus to its damage roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed + 2. During this movement, you ignore difficult terrain and gain a power bonus to all defenses. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Eagle Claw Strike
power.fluff: Your leap is so graceful that you seem to hang in the air for a short period and when you land, you deliver a shattering strike

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature, or one unattended object

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Fortitude
If you have not moved this turn, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll against an unattended object.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC equal to one-half your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn.
Against an unattended object, this attack deals an additional +2d8 damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Against an unattended object, this attack deals half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You fly your speed. If you don't land at the end of this movement, you fall.
